adHeader: No Joke... 2 Night Bahamas Cruise For Two, $29.99!!!*
adDetails: No Joke... 2 Night Bahamas Cruise For Two, $29.99!!!* THIS IS THE BEST DEAL ANYWHERE For $29.99 (Retail Value $500), you'll receive a two-night, round-trip Caribbean Cruise for two adults aboard the award winning Bahamas Celebration!* You'll cruise round-trip from Palm Beach, FL to the tropical Bahamas. Aboard ship, you'll enjoy a comfortable cabin, all your delicious meals, Las Vegas style casino and live stage shows, a relaxing spa, invigorating gym, fun kid's programs for all ages and a wide range of activities for the whole family. *Traveler responsible for port taxes of $59 per person plus gratuities. Offer not valid to residents of South Florida, Alaska, Hawaii and Vermont. Purchase or view more info at: http://www.comresinvestments.com/bahamascruise.html
